channel.title: hare on SoByte
channel.description: Recent content in hare on SoByte

item.title: Challenging C, the new system programming language Hare is released
item.description: Developer Drew DeVault has announced a new system programming language, Hare, which has been in development for nearly two and a half years and uses a statically typed system, manual memory management and a minimal runtime, making it ideal for writing operating systems, system tools, compilers and other low-level, high-performance tasks. According to Drew DeVault, Hare is most similar to C, and almost any program written in C can also
